## Setup Instructions

- Have R and RStudio installed and ready
- Clone the [Github repo](https://github.com/rsangole/2025-R-Medicine_targets-workshop)
- Open the project in RStudio, and run `renv::restore()` to install the needed packages
- For Mac users, a few packages may fail. You may also have to install these dependencies:
    - `brew install mbedtls`
    - `brew install cmake`
